pages.text: Some preparation is required before making tofu.$(br2)First you have to prepare a soymilk bucket and a Bittern Bottle to harden it.

pages.title: SoyMilk Bucket
pages.text: Soymilk is simulator like water.$(br2)but bit different.

pages.title: Bittern
pages.text: To make bittern you need to make salt pan or salt furnace.
Saltpan is easy to make, but it is easily affected by temperature.$(br2)You need a bottle to get a bittern.
Salf Furnace is an easy-to-understand gui instead of using iron.$(br2)You need to put water on water bucket.
when using BitternBottle for soymilk. soymilk turned kinu tofu!
